title: Who is the better singer, the lead singer of Slayer or Corey Taylor? - Quora

response.answer_text: Corey Taylor is the better singer technically, but I would rather have earwigs nesting in my ears than listen to him. Tom Araya (do a little research. It makes for better questions) has a limited vocal range, but he absolutely makes the most of everything he has. His tough, occasionally spooky vocals are the final icing on the Slayer cake, and makes the band the most complete thrash metal band there is.

I don't know who Corey Taylor is, but the lead singer of Slayer can do some great stuff with his voice. His name is Tom Araya. I hope I am not ruining his bad boy reputation as a tough guy, but he is actually really sweet. We had fun hanging out.
